byline.original: By SHERYL GAY STOLBERG and KATIE ROGERS

abstract: Chief medical examiner reveals Alison Parker and Adam Ward, WDBJ journalists in Roanoke, Va, suffered fatal gunshot wounds to the head during live television interview with Vicki Gardner; Gardner is expected to recover from attack by gunman Vester Lee Flanagan II, who later took his own life; debate over gun control laws has reignited across the country.
lead_paragraph: The husband of a woman who survived the attack, Vicki Gardner, said Vester Lee Flanagan II fired several times before hitting her in the back.

headline.main: Virginia Shooting Victims Were Hit in Head, Autopsies Show
headline.print_headline: 2 Journalists Killed on Live TV Were Shot in Head, Medical Examiner Says

snippet: The husband of a woman who survived the attack, Vicki Gardner, said Vester Lee Flanagan II fired several times before hitting her in the back.
